hibernate-mapping.sql-query: SELECT DISTINCT EOOR.ORG_ID, EOOR.MODIFY_TIME, EOOR.EOOR_ORDER_NO, EOOR.EOOR_LOGISTIC_NO, EOOR.EOOR_STATUS_NAME, EOOR.EOOR_STATUS_CODE, EOOR.EOOR_CUSTOMER_CODE, EOOR.EOOR_CUSTOMER_NAME, EOOR.EOOR_ORDER_TYPE_CODE, EOOR.EOOR_ORDER_TYPE_NAME, EOOR.EOOR_SHIPPER_CODE, EOOR.EOOR_SHIPPER_NAME, EOOR.EOOR_CONSIGNEE_CODE, EOOR.EOOR_CONSIGNEE_NAME, EOOR.EOOR_REQUIRE_SHIPPER_TIME_FM, EOOR.EOOR_REQUIRE_SHIPPER_TIME_TO, EOOR.EOOR_REQUIRE_CONSIGNEE_TIME_FM, EOOR.EOOR_REQUIRE_CONSIGNEE_TIME_TO, EOOR.EOOR_SHIPPER_LOCATION_CODE, EOOR.EOOR_SHIPPER_LOCATION_NAME, EOOR.EOOR_SHIPPER_REGION_CODE, EOOR.EOOR_SHIPPER_REGION_NAME, EOOR.EOOR_CONSIGNEE_LOCATION_CODE, EOOR.EOOR_CONSIGNEE_LOCATION_NAME, EOOR.EOOR_CONSIGNEE_REGION_CODE, EOOR.EOOR_CONSIGNEE_REGION_NAME, EOOR.EOOR_PAYMENT_TYPE_CODE, EOOR.EOOR_PAYMENT_TYPE_NAME, EOOR.EOOR_WAREHOUSER_CODE, EOOR.EOOR_WAREHOUSER_NAME, EOOR.EOOR_STATION_CODE, EOOR.EOOR_STATION_NAME, EOOR.EOOR_PRIORITY_CODE, EOOR.EOOR_PRIORITY_NAME, EOOR.EOOR_REQUIREMENT, EOOR.EOOR_REMARK, EOOR.EOOR_PACKAGE_QUANTITY, EOOR.EOOR_QUANTITY, EOOR.EOOR_GROSS_WEIGHT, EOOR.EOOR_NET_WEIGHT, EOOR.EOOR_VOLUME FROM EO_ORDER EOOR WHERE 1 = 1 AND EOOR.REC_STATUS = 0 AND nvl(EOOR.EOOR_MEGER_FLAG, 'N') != 'Y' AND NVL(EOOR.EOOR_SPLIT_FLAG, 'N') != 'Y' << AND EOOR.ORG_ID =:orgId>> << AND EOOR.EOOR_ORDER_NO LIKE '%' || :eoorOrderNo || '%'>> << AND EOOR.EOOR_LOGISTIC_NO LIKE '%' || :eoorLogisticNo || '%' >> << AND EOOR.EOOR_STATUS_NAME LIKE '%' || :eoorStatusName || '%' >> << AND EOOR.EOOR_STATUS_CODE LIKE '%' || :eoorStatusCode || '%' >> << AND EOOR.EOOR_CUSTOMER_CODE LIKE '%' || :eoorCustomerCode || '%' >> << AND EOOR.EOOR_CUSTOMER_NAME LIKE '%' || :eoorCustomerName || '%' >> << AND EOOR.EOOR_ORDER_TYPE_CODE LIKE '%' || :eoorOrderTypeCode || '%' >> << AND EOOR.EOOR_ORDER_TYPE_NAME LIKE '%' || :eoorOrderTypeName || '%' >> << AND EOOR.EOOR_SHIPPER_CODE LIKE '%' || :eoorShipperCode || '%' >> << AND EOOR.EOOR_SHIPPER_NAME LIKE '%' || :eoorShipperName || '%' >> << AND EOOR.EOOR_CONSIGNEE_CODE LIKE '%' || :eoorConsigneeCode || '%' >> << AND EOOR.EOOR_CONSIGNEE_NAME LIKE '%' || :eoorConsigneeName || '%' >> << AND EOOR.EOOR_REQUIRE_SHIPPER_TIME_FM =:eoorRequireShipperTimeFm >> << AND EOOR.EOOR_REQUIRE_SHIPPER_TIME_TO =:eoorRequireShipperTimeTo >> << AND EOOR.EOOR_REQUIRE_CONSIGNEE_TIME_FM =:eoorRequireConsigneeTimeFm >> << AND EOOR.EOOR_REQUIRE_CONSIGNEE_TIME_TO =:eoorRequireConsigneeTimeTo >> << AND EOOR.EOOR_SHIPPER_LOCATION_CODE LIKE '%' || :eoorShipperLocationCode || '%' >> << AND EOOR.EOOR_SHIPPER_LOCATION_NAME LIKE '%' || :eoorShipperLocationName || '%' >> << AND EOOR.EOOR_SHIPPER_REGION_CODE LIKE '%' || :eoorShipperRegionCode || '%' >> << AND EOOR.EOOR_SHIPPER_REGION_NAME LIKE '%' || :eoorShipperRegionName || '%' >> << AND EOOR.EOOR_CONSIGNEE_LOCATION_CODE LIKE '%' || :eoorConsigneeLocationCode || '%' >> << AND EOOR.EOOR_CONSIGNEE_LOCATION_NAME LIKE '%' || :eoorConsigneeLocationName || '%' >> << AND EOOR.EOOR_CONSIGNEE_REGION_CODE LIKE '%' || :eoorConsigneeRegionCode || '%' >> << AND EOOR.EOOR_CONSIGNEE_REGION_NAME LIKE '%' || :eoorConsigneeRegionName || '%' >> << AND EOOR.EOOR_PAYMENT_TYPE_CODE LIKE '%' || :eoorPaymentTypeCode || '%' >> << AND EOOR.EOOR_PAYMENT_TYPE_NAME LIKE '%' || :eoorPaymentTypeName || '%' >> ORDER BY MODIFY_TIME DESC
